m:ScreenDescriptionModel.title: Debug Screen
m:ScreenDescriptionModel.summary: Screen for debug purposes only, for testing any code. Here you could find anything. Will be disabled if we are presenting this demo.

m:ScreenDescriptionModel.title: Cards + Auto Layout
m:ScreenDescriptionModel.summary: This screen show a basic screen with cards. That uses labels, buttons and horizontally scrolling cards that will be harder to render. All elements are arranged using constraints.

m:ScreenDescriptionModel.title: Cards + Custom Layout
m:ScreenDescriptionModel.summary: Screen with cards that uses labels, buttons and horizontally scrolling cards that will be harder to render. But all elements will be arranged without Constraints. Using a Custom Layout that runs over Manual Layout. Showing a better performance.

m:ScreenDescriptionModel.title: Layout Performance
m:ScreenDescriptionModel.summary: This screen is for measuring performance among differents layouts. Generating views with UIStackView, StackView, StackingViews and StackPanel. The process will run an increasing number of iterations.

m:ScreenDescriptionModel.title: Layout Test
m:ScreenDescriptionModel.summary: This screen allow you to play and with a Custom Layout cell and change some fields and watch his behavior. Also you can display his source document to see how they are defined.

m:ScreenDescriptionModel.title: Onboarding Demo
m:ScreenDescriptionModel.summary: This screen show how to create an basic onboarding screen, showcasing some of features, such as vector graphics, gradients and Custom Layout.

m:ScreenDescriptionModel.title: Document List
m:ScreenDescriptionModel.summary: For browsing documents were used to build this demo. Some of these are not accessible in the app.
